author: gstein
msg: Simplify the path handling in file_xfer_under_path. Stick to absolute
paths, and clear a bunch of versioned_abspath cruft.
(file_xfer_under_path): no need to distinguish between full_*_path and
*_abspath since the full_ varieties are abspaths, too. the
versioned_abspath is only used for cp_and_translate, so shift all the
